description: PRISM Development Hooks - Focus on development capabilities only

hooks.name: Skill Discovery Scan
hooks.description: Scans all available skills for relevance

hooks.name: Skill Discovery Rank
hooks.description: Ranks skills by relevance and synergy potential

hooks.name: Skill Discovery Select
hooks.description: Selects optimal skill combination for task

hooks.name: Skill Load Queue
hooks.description: Queues skills for loading in optimal order

hooks.name: Skill Load Execute
hooks.description: Executes skill loading with KV-cache optimization

hooks.name: Skill Apply Learn
hooks.description: Extracts learning patterns from skill application

hooks.name: Skill Combination Validate
hooks.description: Validates skill combination doesn't exceed context budget

hooks.name: Agent Selection Analyze
hooks.description: Analyzes task requirements for agent selection

hooks.name: Agent Selection Match
hooks.description: Matches task to optimal agent tier

hooks.name: Agent Spawn Initialize
hooks.description: Initializes agent spawn with context injection

hooks.name: Agent Task Intervene
hooks.description: Intervenes if agent is stuck or off-track

hooks.name: Swarm Result Merge
hooks.description: Merges swarm results into coherent output

hooks.name: Context Compress Trigger
hooks.description: Triggers context compression at ORANGE level (75-85%)

hooks.name: Context Handoff Save
hooks.description: Saves handoff state to persistent storage

hooks.name: KV-Cache Optimize Order
hooks.description: Optimizes content order for cache reuse

hooks.name: Ralph Loop Complete
hooks.description: Completes Ralph loop with final output

hooks.name: OBRA Observe
hooks.description: Observes and gathers all relevant information

hooks.name: Brainstorm Decide
hooks.description: Makes final decision with chunked approval

hooks.name: Manus Task Analyze
hooks.description: Analyzes if task is suitable for Manus delegation

hooks.name: Manus Code Execute
hooks.description: Delegates code execution to Manus sandbox
